answer.text: Video streaming is about mostly efficient data transfer via HTTP(s). Data is your files, data transfer via webserver may have nothing shared with NodeJS or any kind of backend processing. It...
As already mentioned in comments there are other out of the box options to have a video streaming server available (ngix module seems to be quite appropriate). Nevertheless if you still want...
